Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18331842]Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV):Inhibition of integrase activity (3' end processing)(IC50=165±28 µM); inhibition of integrase activity(strand transfer)(IC50=153±28 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The LEDGF/p75 peptide modestly inhibited IN catalysis and was dependent on IN–DNA assembly. The peptide was also effective at disrupting LEDGF/p75–IN complex formation.

Literature.Title: Inhibitory profile of a LEDGF/p75 peptide against HIV-1 integrase insight into integrase-DNA complex formation and catalysis.
Literature.Author: Al-Mawsawi LQ, Christ F, Dayam R, Debyser Z, Neamati N.
